thread.title: Spotify goes public in a daring stock debut

title: Spotify goes public in a daring stock debut
text:
Spotify goes public in a daring stock debut 11:04am BST - 01:47 
Spotify's unusual stock market debut on Tuesday levels the playing field for individual investors who are normally at a disadvantage in traditional listings, but could also make investors more vulnerable to swings in the music streaming service’s share price.
